attributes.action: scrap the proposed Merseytram scheme and instead finance a major expansion of the Merseyrail Underground system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 'Merseytram' scheme put forward by Merseytravel & Liverpool City Council is completley inadequate for the City of Liverpool and will only create more traffic chaos. 

The only real transport solution in this city is a major expansion of the Liverpool (Merseyrail) Underground system, which has huge potential. We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to make available £5 billion for new underground lines and underground stations on the Merseyrail network
